Quiz.question:
1 Part II: Executing the Response Select the correct option, and click the Submit button. Which hazard is most likely present, based on the results of your initial entry measurements? The results from the measurements taken during your initial entry into the hot zone are:
  • 451P-Background
  • EPDs-Background; no accumulated dose
  • CDS Kit-Nothing detected
  • M8/M9-No color change
  • M256-Negative
  • TVA-1000B-Nothing detected Lt Smith PlaceHolder Text 3 Biological Hazard(s) Chemical Warfare Agent(s) Common Toxic Industrial Chemical(s) Non-volatile Organic Compound(s) Volatile Organic Compound(s) Radiation 1
